page.title: 06LIFESTYLE MY FAMILY
page.content: My family has six people in it,mother father,two girls and two boys.My dad works in Ripon and drives a lorry.My mum has a part-time job.She is the caretaker at Sawley school.My older brother is 17 and left school a year ago.He is now on a Youth Training Scheme.Every other month he goes to Hull to a Crystal motor firm.My other brother(13)and my sister(15)go to Ripon City school.I am 10 and am at Sawley school.My sister leaves school next year.She wants to do secretarial work.Our house was built about 17 years ago.We have been the only family living in this house.There are three bedrooms;my two brothers share a room and I share one with my sister.We have tea at 5 or 6 o'clock.Yesterday we had beef,potatoes,peas,cabbage and gravy.Sometimes we watch television,or go out to play on the green.
